oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Post card of Pvt. Jacob M. Fletcher, Co. B, 64th Va. Mtd. Inf. Regt., CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a post card of Pvt. Jacob M. Fletcher, Co. B, 64th Va. Mtd. Inf. Regt., CSA showing him wearing a United Confederate Veterans uniform and holding a hat with a UCV badge. Fletcher was born in 1842 in Lee, Virginia. He died in 1928 in Chattanooga. He was buried in Hamilton Memorial Park, Red Bank, Hamilton County, Tenn. He lived in Rugby, Tenn. after the war and later in Chattanooga.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Fletcher, Jacob M.
